scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm recursive publish --filter './packages/*' --no-git-checks --report-summary
scripts.release:beta: pnpm run build && pnpm recursive publish --filter './packages/*' --no-git-checks --report-summary --tag beta
scripts.release:rc: pnpm run build && pnpm recursive publish --filter './packages/*' --no-git-checks --report-summary --tag rc
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production pnpm run build:check && pnpm run build:packages
scripts.build:check: pnpm run format:check && pnpm run security:check
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run build:metadata && pnpm run build:resolver && pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:lib && pnpm run build:module && pnpm run build:themes && pnpm run build:icons && pnpm run build:showcase
scripts.build:apidoc: pnpm --filter themes build:tokens && pnpm --filter showcase build:apidoc
